channel.title: 562 background? REP+
channel.description:
Will someone please tell me how to change a 562 client background, ive tried toms cache editor, ive tried dragonkk's cache editor but there are absolutely no tuts on how to use it, ive been trying for 2 hours now, i would really just like some help on this.. please..
REP+..

item.title: 562 background? REP+
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Toms Cache Editor doesnt work with 562s and Dragonkk’s has no run.bat like its supposed to to built into the client, idk, just nvm

Read full topic

item.title: 562 background? REP+
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Open the Cache editor
Go to the top click"Load Cache"
Once you load it click “Edit Media or something”
Then a you should have three options choose “Title”
After there will be your buttons etc find your background then click"import"
Then just click “Save”

Read full topic
